Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Aim for projects with the highest priority first

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Increase the average amount of story points a team completes per sprint

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize the implementation of high-priority features

Name: maximize_sprint_story_points
Description: Maximize the number of story points completed within a single sprint

Name: minimize_project_budget_usage
Description: Complete the project using as little of the allocated budget as possible

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Reduce the overall effort required to complete tasks in a sprint

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Reduce the impact and severity of impediments that block progress

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Ensure that stakeholders with high influence are satisfied with the outcomes

Name: maximize_features_in_release
Description: Include as many features as possible in a planned release

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Deliver the project in the shortest possible time frame

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Improve the overall satisfaction of the team after each sprint

Name: maximize_user_story_priority
Description: Focus sprint work on user stories with the highest priority
